ttp_template:
<group name="destination_interface_next_hop_mac_outgoing_interface">
  Status: {{STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
  Outgoing Interface: {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
  Destination: {{DESTINATION | ORPHRASE}}
  Next Hop MAC: {{NEXT_HOP_MAC | ORPHRASE}}
  Outgoing Interface: {{OUTGOING_INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Interface: Ethernet1/1
  Destination: 10.0.0.2
  Next Hop MAC: 00:1B:44:11:3A:B7
  Outgoing Interface: Ethernet1/2
  Status: up

Interface: Ethernet1/2
  Destination: 192.168.1.1
  Next Hop MAC: 00:1B:44:11:3A:C8
  Outgoing Interface: Ethernet1/3
  Status: down

Interface: Ethernet1/3
  Destination: 172.16.0.5
  Next Hop MAC: 00:1B:44:11:3A:D9
  Outgoing Interface: Ethernet1/4
  Status: up
textfsm_template:
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value DESTINATION (\d{1,3}(?:\.\d{1,3}){3})
Value NEXT_HOP_MAC (\S+)
Value OUTGOING_INTERFACE (\S+)
Value STATUS (\S+)

Start
  ^Interface:\s+${INTERFACE}$$
  ^\s+Destination:\s+${DESTINATION}$$
  ^\s+Next Hop MAC:\s+${NEXT_HOP_MAC}$$
  ^\s+Outgoing Interface:\s+${OUTGOING_INTERFACE}$$
  ^\s+Status:\s+${STATUS}$$ -> Record
